official-title.#text:
To require States and local educational agencies to
		  report on the achievement of military-connected students in annual report cards
		  under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Education and the
			 Workforce

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following bill; which was referred to
			 the

quote.#text:
Helping
			 Military Children Succeed in Schools Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

			 1111(h)(1)(C) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965

Reporting on

text.#text:
not later than the beginning of the

				students achieved on the State academic assessments described in
